mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mainpage(mainPageSequence, mainPageSubject, mainPageLink, midx, aidx) VALUES(#{mainPageSequence}, #{mainPageSubject}, #{mainPageLink}, #{midx}, #{aidx})
mapper.select: SELECT a.mainPageLink,a.aidx,a.mainPageSubject from mainpage a join attachfile b on a.aidx=b.aidx where b.category="vanners" and b.fileYN='N' ORDER BY a.mainPageSequence asc;
SELECT b.cidx,a.aidx,b.contentsSubject FROM attachfile a join contents b on a.aidx=b.aidx WHERE a.category = "contents" and a.fileYN='N' ORDER BY a.fileUploadDay DESC LIMIT 7;
SELECT b.cidx,a.aidx,b.contentsSubject FROM attachfile a join contents b on a.aidx=b.aidx WHERE a.category = "contents" and a.fileYN='N' ORDER BY b.contentsViewCount DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT b.nidx,a.aidx,b.noticeSubject FROM attachfile a join notice b on a.aidx=b.aidx WHERE a.category = "notice" and a.fileYN='N' ORDER BY a.fileUploadDay DESC LIMIT 4;
SELECT a.mainPageSequence,a.mpidx,a.mainPageSubject,b.fileUploadDay from mainpage a join attachfile b on a.aidx=b.aidx where b.category="vanners" and b.fileYN='N' ORDER BY a.mainPageSequence asc;
